assertionResults.fullName: background sim toggle by visibility emits bg-tick events at ~2Hz when started
assertionResults.title: emits bg-tick events at ~2Hz when started

assertionResults.fullName: background sim toggle by visibility stops emitting when stopped
assertionResults.title: stops emitting when stopped

assertionResults.fullName: background sim toggle by visibility only ticks when document is visible
assertionResults.title: only ticks when document is visible

assertionResults.fullName: background sim contract exposes a stable bg-tick event name for listeners
assertionResults.title: exposes a stable bg-tick event name for listeners

assertionResults.title: never exceeds intended low frequency in hidden mode (doc test)

assertionResults.title: clamps to [1,2] by default
